column4: hello, i would like to know if i can install KDE + openbox3 on ubuntu server on my laptop my system is 256mb ram 1.4ghz processer and 64mb vram (i need a good distro for this configuration) , i want a nice and good DE and WM with menu's and all stuff like gnome (i do not want gnome) !!!###@@@ram is not upgradable@@@###!!!
enlightenment fits your needs best..if you want a bit of eye-candy that is
look at e17.dunnewind.net..e17 is a desktop environment like kde and gnome..but runs better on low ram etc
